segments.text: I can't believe what I'm seeing in this kitchen drawing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is drying dishes, oblivious to the disaster brewing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is full to the brim, water cascading down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle spreading fast, her shoe's wet and she doesn't care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains are pulled back from the window, showing a calm yard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, it's anything but calm with the kids up to no good.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy climbing on that shaky two-step stool toward the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got one hand in the cookie jar, the other holding a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl next to him is reaching up, expecting a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're cooperating in this little theft, so cute yet risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If the stool tips, he could fall right onto the wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And slip, breaking dishes or worse.
segments.speaker: PAR
